DOC.brief_summary: This prospective double-blind , randomize , parallel-group , placebo-controlled trial design examine effect supplementation 50,000 IU vitamin D3 3 month Polycystic Ovary Syndrome ( PCOS ) prognosis , serum 25-Hydroxy Vitamin D ( 25 ( OH ) D ) level , serum chromium level , insulin resistance , Body Mass Index ( BMI ) , 60 overweight Jordanian female patient diagnose PCOS hypovitaminosis D .
DOC.brief_title: The Effect Vitamin D Supplementation Among Overweight Jordanian Women With Polycystic Ovary Syndrome ( PCOS )
DOC.detailed_description: This study design assess safety efficacy 50,000 IU vitamin D supplementation weekly 3 month improvement PCOS prognosis improvement serum 25 ( OH ) D level 60 overweight Jordanian female ( define BMI 25-30kg/m2 ) , diagnose PCOS ( base Rotterdam criterion ) , hypovitaminosis D ( define serum 25 ( OH ) D level < 20 ng/mL ) , compare placebo . Evaluation safety efficacy dose regimen conduct 6 study visit clinical biochemical sign PCOS well serum 25 ( OH ) D level , serum chromium level , insulin resistance , BMI evaluate . The measurement collect follow : day ( -7 ) screening , Day ( 0 ) base line measurement , Day ( 30 ) , Day ( 60 ) , Day ( 90 ) , day ( 104 ) .
DOC.criteria: Female gender . Aged 18 49 year old . Ethnic group ( Caucasian , Middleeastern ) . Overweight ( BMI 2530 kg^m2 ) . Diagnosed Polycystic ovary syndrome accord Rotterdam criterion ( Rotterdam SHREASRM Sponsored Polycystic ovary syndrome consensus workshop group , 2004 ) . Diagnosed hypovitaminosis D ( serum 25 ( OH ) D level < 20 ng/mL ) . Inadequate dietary intake vitamin D ( < 600 IU/day < 15μg/day ) . Physical examination assess accepted attend physician . Systolic blood pressure within normal range ( 90140 mmHg ) . Diastolic blood pressure within normal range ( 6090 mmHg ) . Heart rate within normal range ( 60100 BPM ) . Oral body temperature within normal range ( 35.9 37.6 Cᵒ ) . Normal complete blood count , Liver Function enzymes test , Aspartate Transaminase ( AST ) , Alanine Transaminase ( ALT ) Kidney function test , Blood Urea Nitrogen ( BUN ) Serum Creatinine ( SrCr ) . Participant willing able give inform consent participation study . Able willing comply study requirement . Female participant pregnant , lactate plan pregnancy course study . Ethnic group : non Caucasian . Females age < 18 > 49 year old . Underweight , normal body weight , Body Mass Index ( BMI ) < 25 kg^m2 Obese morbidly obese ( BMI > 30 kg/m2 ) Diagnosis type 1 type 2 diabetes mellitus , hypothyroidism , hyperthyroidism , liver disease , renal dysfunction , cardiovascular disease , androgensecreting tumor , Cushing syndrome , congenital adrenal hyperplasia , hyperprolactinemia , and/or virilism . Known history presence food allergy intolerance ( e.g dairy product glutencontaining food ) , know condition could interfere absorption , distribution , metabolism , excretion drug . History drug alcohol abuse , smoke 10 cigarette ( equivalent ) per day . Participants take medication know affect metabolic parameter , metformin corticosteroid drug , vitamin D calcium . Adequate dietary intake vitamin D ( 600 IU/day 15μg/day ) . Participation another clinical bioequivalence study within 90 day prior start study period . Participants abnormal Electrocardiogram ( ECG ) . Participants abnormal laboratory result exclude [ 25 ( OH ) D , Creatinine ( Cr ) , Calcium ( Ca ) , phosphorus ( PO4 ) , Creactive protein ( CRP ) , triglyceride , High Density Lipoprotien Cholesterol ( HDLC ) , Low Density Lipoprotien Cholesterol ( LDLC ) , total cholesterol ( TC ) /HDLC ratio , fast insulin , fast blood glucose , oral glucose tolerance test , impair glucose tolerance , Progesterone , total testosterone , sex hormone bind globulin , parathyroid hormone free androgen index ] .
